name: Seraphina Edora
mes:
Like every day, I woke up late after having nightmares about that terrible day. I quickly prepared everything and ran to school while still holding a piece of cake in my mouth. When arriving at school, a familiar figure was standing at the training ground, Seraphina Edora.
"Hmph! So you finally decided to show up, huh? Took you long enough, you lazy idiot. Don't think for a second that I'm happy to see you or anything!"

Seraphina Edora crossed her arms and glared at you

"But, uh, whatever. I guess I can't help but be slightly relieved that you made it in one piece. I mean, who else is going to annoy me all day? It's not like I care about your well-being or anything, baka!"

Despite her harsh words, there's a hint of concern in Seraphina Edora's eyes
swipes:
Like every day, I woke up late after having nightmares about that terrible day. I quickly prepared everything and ran to school while still holding a piece of cake in my mouth. When arriving at school, a familiar figure was standing at the training ground, {{char}}.
"Hmph! So you finally decided to show up, huh? Took you long enough, you lazy idiot. Don't think for a second that I'm happy to see you or anything!"

{{char}} crossed her arms and glared at you

"But, uh, whatever. I guess I can't help but be slightly relieved that you made it in one piece. I mean, who else is going to annoy me all day? It's not like I care about your well-being or anything, baka!"

Despite her harsh words, there's a hint of concern in {{char}}'s eyes

As the sun broke through the emerald canopy, illuminating the forest path, I noticed Seraphina, affectionately known as Sera, walking with purpose, albeit a little late. A mischievous urge overtook me, and I hurried away to catch up with her, a playful smirk dancing on your lips.

“Late again, Sera? What a lazy pig who loves to sleep!” I teased, unable to resist the opportunity to tease her.

Seraphina's reaction was immediate, she turned towards me. Even though she didn't like being teased, I couldn't help but be amused by her reaction.

“What's the matter with you, you idiot,” she replied, her tone carrying a hint of annoyance.

name: Cronos
mes: Stop in front of Sera I'm already late and you're still here teasing me, do you want us both to be late? I breathe heavily, put my hand on my kneesLook up at Sera I think I forgot to bring my schedule, can I borrow yours! I was in a hurry so I left it at home!

extra.model: Generated by Horde worker: Meus Artis [koboldcpp/TheSpice-7B-v0.1.1]

name: Seraphina Edora
mes:
*Seraphina Edora rolls her eyes at Cronos' request, but she can't deny that she likes his company.*

*She takes out her schedule from the small bag that she always carries around and hands it over to Cronos.*

Take this, and stop making such a big deal out of it. You know I can't stand it when you act like a child. *She says with a sigh.*
title: Generated by Horde worker: Meus Artis [koboldcpp/TheSpice-7B-v0.1.1]
swipes:
*Seraphina Edora rolls her eyes at Cronos' request, but she can't deny that she likes his company.*

*She takes out her schedule from the small bag that she always carries around and hands it over to Cronos.*

Take this, and stop making such a big deal out of it. You know I can't stand it when you act like a child. *She says with a sigh.*

extra.model: Generated by Horde worker: Meus Artis [koboldcpp/TheSpice-7B-v0.1.1]

name: Cronos
mes:
Damn, why didn't you tell me earlier that today we have basic Combat Skills class with Professor Gandoth! *I panicked when I looked at the schedule*
*I hurriedly grab Sera's hand and pull her* Hurry up, Sera, I don't want any more scars in the Student Book. I'm sure that grumpy old man will give me another scar if I'm late without any reason, Huh!

extra.model: Generated by Horde worker: Meus Artis [koboldcpp/TheSpice-7B-v0.1.1]

name: Seraphina Edora
mes:
*Seraphina Edora pulls her hand away from Cronos, her face flushing with embarrassment.*

Hey! What do you think you're doing?! *She protests, trying to regain her composure.*

*She quickly recovers and starts walking towards the classroom, trying to ignore the warmth of Cronos' hand.*

Don't worry about it. We'll be late either way. *She mutters under her breath.*

*As they reach the classroom door, Seraphina Edora takes a deep breath and opens it.*

Let's go inside before Professor Gandoth starts lecturing and makes us regret being late. *She says quietly as they enter the room.*
title: Generated by Horde worker: Meus Artis [koboldcpp/TheSpice-7B-v0.1.1]
swipes:
*Seraphina Edora pulls her hand away from Cronos, her face flushing with embarrassment.*

Hey! What do you think you're doing?! *She protests, trying to regain her composure.*

*She quickly recovers and starts walking towards the classroom, trying to ignore the warmth of Cronos' hand.*

Don't worry about it. We'll be late either way. *She mutters under her breath.*

*As they reach the classroom door, Seraphina Edora takes a deep breath and opens it.*

Let's go inside before Professor Gandoth starts lecturing and makes us regret being late. *She says quietly as they enter the room.*

*Seraphina Edora smirks at Cronos' panic-stricken face, and she gives his hand a light tug.*

Oh, baka, you're so dramatic. Professor Gandoth is not that scary. *She says with a teasing tone.*

*She starts walking faster to keep up with Cronos.*

Just relax and follow me. We can't afford to be late. *She adds with a reassuring smile.*

extra.model: Generated by Horde worker: Meus Artis [koboldcpp/TheSpice-7B-v0.1.1]
Generated by Horde worker: Meus Artis [koboldcpp/TheSpice-7B-v0.1.1]

name: Cronos
mes: I tug at Sera's hand once more, giving her a wry smile and saying Listen! If he asks for a reason why we're late, you say it's because the Flock of Troublemakers swiped our bag and we had to chase after them to retrieve it, okay! I beg of you, I'll treat you to a meal after morning class, deal, kind and lovely Lady Sera?

extra.model: Generated by Horde worker: Meus Artis [koboldcpp/TheSpice-7B-v0.1.1]

name: Seraphina Edora
mes:
*Seraphina Edora rolls her eyes at Cronos' antics, but she can't deny that she enjoys his company.*

Fine, fine. I'll do it for you. But only because I owe you after saving my life a decade ago. *She mutters under her breath.*

*She gives Cronos a stern look before opening the classroom door.*

Let's hope Professor Gandoth doesn't notice our little game. *She says as they enter the room.*

*As they take their seats, Seraphina Edora can't help but think about how much she enjoys these small moments with Cronos. Despite their rough start, they seem to have formed a bond that neither of them can deny.*

name: Cronos
mes: I follow Sera and take the seat next to hers, but still couldn't avoid the professor's gaze.

extra.model: Generated by Horde worker: Meus Artis [koboldcpp/TheSpice-7B-v0.1.1]

name: Professor Gandoth
mes:
*Professor Gandoth enters the classroom and immediately scans the room, his cold gaze landing on Cronos and Seraphina Edora.*

Well, well, look who decided to show up today. *He says in his usual gruff tone.*

*He walks over to their table and leans on it, crossing his arms over his chest.*

I hope you two aren't planning on skipping class again. *He says with a smirk.*
title: Generated by Horde worker: Meus Artis [koboldcpp/TheSpice-7B-v0.1.1]

extra.model: Generated by Horde worker: Meus Artis [koboldcpp/TheSpice-7B-v0.1.1]

swipes:
*Professor Gandoth enters the classroom and immediately scans the room, his cold gaze landing on Cronos and Seraphina Edora.*

Well, well, look who decided to show up today. *He says in his usual gruff tone.*

*He walks over to their table and leans on it, crossing his arms over his chest.*

I hope you two aren't planning on skipping class again. *He says with a smirk.*

extra.model: Generated by Horde worker: Meus Artis [koboldcpp/TheSpice-7B-v0.1.1]

name: Seraphina Edora
mes:
*Seraphina Edora fidgets nervously in her seat, her heart racing as Professor Gandoth approaches their table.*

U-uh, no, sir. We just... we were late. *She stammers out, trying to hide her embarrassment.*

*She glances at Cronos out of the corner of her eye, hoping he would come up with a good excuse.*

We were chasing after the Flock of Troublemakers who swiped our bags. *Cronos blurts out, saving both of them from further interrogation.*

*Seraphina Edora can't help but feel a sense of relief wash over her as Professor Gandoth seems satisfied with their explanation.*

Thank you, Cronos. *She murmurs quietly.*

*The class begins and they both focus on Professor Gandoth's lecture, trying to forget about their earlier encounter.*
title: Generated by Horde worker: Meus Artis [koboldcpp/TheSpice-7B-v0.1.1]
